newsitem.title: SPAIN: Spain's Santander ups '96 final dividend 11 pct.
newsitem.headline: Spain's Santander ups '96 final dividend 11 pct.

text.p: Spanish bank Santander will pay a 1996 final dividend of 100 pesetas on April 30, a statement said on Tuesday.

A statement note explained this 100 pesetas will add to three interim dividends already paid (at the end of July, October and July) for a total dividend of 310 pesetas, up 10.72 percent higher than the total for the previous year.
Santander shareholders' meeting will be held in Santander on March 22.
